𒃻 NINDA 𓏐𓏏 naan dough

𒃻 /?/ bread@Luwian (logogram or also phonetic?)
𒃻𒅥 nig̃₂-gu₇ /nig̃gu/, “food”
𒃻𒁀 • (nig̃₂-ba /nig̃ba/) gift Synonym: (Emesal) 𒉘𒁀 (ag̃₂-ba /ag̃ba/) allotment, portion
𒃻𒊮 • (kadra₂ /kadra/) 𒃻𒊮𒀀 • (kadra) greeting gifts, present (to a superior) bribe, offering
𒂍𒃻𒂵 • (e₂-nig̃₂-gur₁₁ /ēnig̃gur/) depot (put food at house)
𒃻𒂵 • (nig̃₂-gur₁₁ /nig̃gur/) property 𒃻𒂵 NIG₂.GA makkūrum
